## Documentation Issue

### What's Wrong?

A clear description of the documentation problem.

### Location

- **File:** [e.g., README.md, docs/overview.md]
- **Section:** [e.g., "Quick Start", line 45]
- **Link:** (if applicable)

### Issue Type

- [ ] Broken or dead link
- [ ] Typo or grammatical error
- [ ] Unclear or confusing explanation
- [ ] Missing information
- [ ] Outdated content
- [ ] Incorrect code example
- [ ] Other (please describe)

### Suggested Fix

Describe how the documentation should be corrected or improved.

### Additional Context

Add any other context, screenshots, or examples that would help clarify the issue.

## Checklist

- [ ] I have checked that this issue doesn't already exist
- [ ] I have provided the specific location of the issue
- [ ] I have suggested a fix or improvement
